participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, enjoys engaging in conversations with new people.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a small town and recently moved to the city for work. Loves exploring new places and cultures.

participant_2.name: David Smith
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and approachable, often initiates conversations and enjoys listening to others.
participant_2.background: Born and raised in the city, works as a graphic designer, and has a passion for art and technology.
